name: L'aventure de Nolie
description:
L'aventure de Nolie is a visual novel for children.

The star of the fir tree is gone. Nolie has to find it and put it on top of the tree for the Christmas magic to work. With the help of Sados and the storyteller he will have to seize his courage and face his fears.

Game Design : CUELLO Aldaberto, ROSSEL Martin, VREL Eloïse.

Game Art : BOUCHER Camille,  COLLINO Valentine, FASENTIEUX Agathe, LEVASTRE Maëlys, RAJENDRAN Keethana.
